errm, did you say you formatted the ipod on a mac?
errm iirc you'll need read/write access to the mac partition -- and i'm a little unsure on that
what does this command output?  file -s /dev/sda3
ok -- try this command-  sudo sh -c "umount /dev/sda3; mount -t hfs /dev/sda3 /media/ipod -o rw"
mount: mount point /media/ipod does not exist
sorry -  sudo sh -c "umount /dev/sda3; mkdir /media/ipod; mount -t hfs /dev/sda3 /media/ipod -o rw"
make sure you copied that command down right
